Title: AN ACT APPROPRIATING FUNDS TO COVER THE DEFICIT INCURRED BY THE CONSTITUTIONAL CONVENTION.

[ Acts No. 4226, August 09, 1935 ]
AN ACT APPROPRIATING FUNDS TO COVER THE DEFICIT INCURRED BY THE CONSTITUTIONAL CONVENTION.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. The sum of one hundred and sixty-eighty thousand and five hundred pesos is hereby appropriated, out of general funds not otherwise appropriated, to cover the deficit incurred by the Constitutional Convention, as itemized below:

For payment of the expenses of the election of Delegates to the Constitutional Convention P122,000
For printing the Journal and other documents of the Constitutional Convention 25,000
For extra compensation for employees of the Philippine Legislature who rendered service to the Constitutional Convention during the months of January and February, 1935, any provision to the contrary notwithstanding 10,000
For payment of bills rendered by Bureaus and offices, including miscellaneous expenses 7,500
For traveling expenses of the Delegates coming from and returning to their respective districts after the sessions of the Convention 4,000
Total P168,500

Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.1a—àphi1
Approved, August 9, 1935.
